derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Latin allegation (n-), from allegare 'allege'

entry.def: An allegation is a statement saying that someone has done something wrong.

example.ex: The company has denied the allegations...
Allegations of brutality and theft have been levelled at the army.
example.tran: 有人指责军队中存在着野蛮暴行和盗窃行为。

means.word_mean: 1. (law) a formal accusation against somebody (often in a court of law);
2. statements affirming or denying certain matters of fact that you are prepared to prove

Sentence.sentence: This allegation has led to Google becoming mired in (陷入) a legal battle whose scope and complexity makes the Jarndyce and Jarndyce case in Charles Dickens' Bleak House look straightforward.
